proposals.gesture: Use the index to move the cursor, then use the index and thumb fingers to move the word to desired position
proposals.reasons: I pyhsically need to move the word, to take it and, like holding it in my hand
proposals.notes: Maybe it is not the preferred to everyone, but only to me.

proposals.gesture: Use the index to move the cursor (make space), then just typing
(Similar to reorderSingle) Use the index and thumb to select the words, then move the whole hand to move them to desired position
proposals.reasons: It would be easier to select multiple words

proposals.example: What took you so long so long
proposals.gesture: select the two words with the index and thumb of the right hand then through the whole hand to the top-right to delete
proposals.reasons: In similar way to delete in virtual reality, and the from the physical world

proposals.example: How far had Morino lived in America
proposals.gesture: (Similar to deleteGroup) Select with the index and thumb, then through the hand to the top-right to delete, then typing
proposals.reasons: I was thinking about deleting the word or not, in order to have clean sentence

proposals.example: (Similar to deleteGroup) He likes  to eat healthy when visiting visiting resturants
proposals.gesture: Move the cursor, then select with the thump and inedx and then through it away

proposals.example: (Similar to replaceSingle) How long have her had this fever? (have her -> has she)
proposals.gesture: Move the cursor, then select with the index and the thumb, then just typing
proposals.reasons: I did not delete because it is a group of words, therefore, I prefer to just select and type

comments: It is interesting, i would like to try it. I am not sure about longer sentence.
